column5: SPECIAL OFFER FOR AUGUST 2017 !!!!!  Enjoy a 3 bedrooms (each with closet and private bathroom) retreat. With magnificent views of the Barton Creek hill site and golf course country club. Watch breathtaking sunsets from the large terrace.    Built in 2016, this one floor vacation rental of 2000 square feet living space plus 1000 square feet partially covered terrace sleeps 6 guests in a modern atmosphere reminding of an exquisite boutique hotel.
